title: Dr. Morris Hein Endowed Scholarship in Chemistry
description: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for full-time junior or senior students majoring in Chemistry who exemplify honesty and integrity and are enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide undergraduate scholarship awards for full-time junior or senior students majoring in Chemistry who exemplify honesty and integrity and are enrolled in the College of Arts and Sciences at the University of Colorado Boulder.
